title: 2. Gift Shop ( WooCommerce )
desc: Contains the WooCommerce gift shop demo . Note that you should install WooCommerce, MailChimp and YITH WooCommerce Wishlist plugins firsts. If you don\'t plan to use MailChimp for WordPress or YITH WooCommerce Wishlist, you can always deactivate them after import.

mailchimp-for-wp\/mailchimp-for-wp.php.Name: MailChimp for WordPress
mailchimp-for-wp\/mailchimp-for-wp.php.Description: MailChimp for WordPress by ibericode. Adds various highly effective sign-up methods to your site. By ibericode.
mailchimp-for-wp\/mailchimp-for-wp.php.Author: ibericode
mailchimp-for-wp\/mailchimp-for-wp.php.Title: MailChimp for WordPress

woocommerce\/woocommerce.php.Name: WooCommerce
woocommerce\/woocommerce.php.Description: An e-commerce toolkit that helps you sell anything. Beautifully. By WooThemes.
woocommerce\/woocommerce.php.Author: WooThemes
woocommerce\/woocommerce.php.Title: WooCommerce

yith-woocommerce-wishlist\/init.php.Name: YITH WooCommerce Wishlist
yith-woocommerce-wishlist\/init.php.Description: YITH WooCommerce Wishlist allows you to add Wishlist functionality to your e-commerce. By YITHEMES.
yith-woocommerce-wishlist\/init.php.Author: YITHEMES
yith-woocommerce-wishlist\/init.php.Title: YITH WooCommerce Wishlist

page.post_content:
[vc_row][vc_column][plethora_headinggroup subtitle="Woo Shortcode" divider="1"]

LatestProducts

[/plethora_headinggroup][recent_products per_page="8" columns="4" orderby="date" order="DESC"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" content_placement="middle" row_padding_top="padding_top_none"][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-7" css=".vc_custom_1487157751770{background-image: url(https://plethorathemes.com/hotel-xenia/shop/wp-content/uploadt/sites/2/2017/02/bottle-spice-ball.jpg?id=27) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="300px"][vc_empty_space height="200px" el_class="hidden-xs hidden-sm hidden-md"][vc_empty_space height="100px" el_class="hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="100px" el_class="hidden-xs hidden-sm"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" color_set="light_section" align="text-left" boxed="boxed_plus" el_class="col-md-pull-1" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-5"][plethora_headinggroup subtitle="TRAVEL PACK" align="text-left" subtitle_position="top" divider=""]

BOTTLES & KITCHENWARE

[/plethora_headinggroup][vc_column_text]They're seas gathering behold the years saying make and divide fill given whales fill female moved, blessed. Midst one from divide whales seasons cattle male own saying to night fruit own creeping second earth be lesser without deep beast female.[/vc_column_text][plethora_button button_text="VIEW DETAILS" button_link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fplethorathemes.com%2Fhotel-xenia%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2Fkitchenware-pack%2F|||" button_with_icon="0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding_top="padding_top_none"][vc_column width="1/3"][plethora_teaserbox orientation_style="vertical" title="Free Shipping" media_type="icon" icon="fa fa-gift"]Xenia Resort has its own private parking for customers. It is fully protected and covered for rain or sunny weather.[/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][plethora_teaserbox orientation_style="vertical" title="Secure Payments" media_type="icon" icon="fa fa-credit-card"]We are happy to answer your questions or give you directions via phone. 222 5548 656[/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][plethora_teaserbox orientation_style="vertical" title="ECO Package" media_type="icon" icon="fa fa-leaf"]If you are on the go and still want to ask a question, simply drop us an e-mail. support@ple-hotel-xenia.com[/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" color_set="black_section" transparent_overlay="transparent_film" align="text-center" css=".vc_custom_1486026869761{background-image: url(https://plethorathemes.com/hotel-xenia/wp-content/uploadt/2016/11/newsletter-banner-1.jpg?id=251) !important;}" el_class="large_form"][vc_column width="2/3" offset="vc_col-sm-offset-2"][plethora_headinggroup divider="1"]

Newsletter

[/plethora_headinggroup][vc_column_text]

Subscribe to our newsletter and get free (and early) access to our news, our stories and Xenia Resort exclusive offers.

[/vc_column_text][plethora_mailchimp mailchimp_form="96"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

post.post_content: Welcome to Hotel Xenia Theme. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

comments.comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.
